Purpose: To detect Norovirus RNA in patient specimens using PCR for accurate and timely diagnosis.
Container: Sterile leak-proof container (for stool or vomitus) or sterile swab in transport medium (for rectal swab)
Equipment: RNA extraction kit, PCR reagents (master mix, primers, probes), PCR thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes, DNA/RNA-free workstations
